welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Jacmel, a city known for its vibrant arts scene, beautiful beaches, and charming colonial architecture. We hope you take the time to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit."

restaurants.name: Chez Hubert
restaurants.description: Chez Hubert is a diner located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussaint Louverture International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Toussaint Louverture International Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for a fee.
